item.title: Pandoc and Reveal
item.description: # ## This slideshow is written in Markdown, a plain text format. view the slideshow in markdown Converted into an HTML5, revealjs document using Pandoc. Yes, it really is that easy. Aren’t some steps missing? Everything else just happens once you have it set up. Pandoc uses a template to convert the Markdown to HTML5. The HTML5 document is automatically formatted for use with and linked to reveal.
